Contact Person

The person(s) listed here will receive the quarterly "request for status update" emails. This person is the most suited to receive these emails and may or may not be the actual concept lead. Concept lead(s) and other co-investigators should be listed on the next form.

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: SELECT a.record, CONCAT_WS(' ', CONCAT( '"', max(if(a.field_name = 'firstname', a.value, '')), ' ', max(if(a.field_name = 'lastname', a.value, '')), '"'), CONCAT('< ' , max(if(a.field_name = 'email', a.value, '')), '>' ) ) as value FROM [data-table:2128] a WHERE a.project_id=2128 GROUP BY a.record ORDER BY value

SELECT a.record, CONCAT_WS(' ', CONCAT( '"', max(if(a.field_name = 'firstname', a.value, '')), ' ', max(if(a.field_name = 'lastname', a.value, '')), '"'), CONCAT('< ' , max(if(a.field_name = 'email', a.value, '')), '>' ) ) as value FROM [data-table:2128] a WHERE a.project_id=2128 GROUP BY a.record ORDER BY value

Field Label:
Dear Concept Lead for [concept_id], Please submit a brief status report on the following project:

Concept: [configuration_arm_1][concept_title] ([concept_id])

Current Project Status
Please select the most recent status that applies to your concept sheet.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Approved | 2, Data requested | 3, Data analysis | 4, Abstract submitted | 5, Abstract accepted | 6, Manuscript submitted | 7, Manuscript under revision | 8, Published

Field Label:
Please give a 2-3 sentence update on this project.
This can include updates on data collection, preparation, and analysis; work on abstracts or manuscripts; writing group meetings; journal/conference submissions; or waiting periods (to receive data, to hear from reviewers, etc.)
Research Products linked to this concept: (Missing data will show as a blank. To update data on existing publications shown below, e-mail hubadmin@fakeemail.org)

Field Label:
Author List
Use PubMed format: (e.g., Duda SN, Vansell HJ, McGowan CC)
Journal / Conference Name (e.g., JAIDS, JIAS, CROI, IWHOD)

Citation
Use PubMed format: (e.g., J Int AIDS Soc. 2018 Feb; 21(S1):e25044)
Web link (URL) to resource (optional)

Short Title
Provide a short title for the document.

Description
(optional) Provide a brief description of the document. This text will be displayed on the Hub interface.

File Upload
Use a ZIP to combine multiple files

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Lead team | 2, Harmonist rep | 3, SAWG rep | 4, AYANI Data Center rep | 10, Appeal slot | 11, Expert contributor | 12, External collaborator | 13, Protocol chair | 98, Admin support (non-author) | 99, Other

SELECT a.record,
	CONCAT_WS(' ',
		CONCAT( '"', max(if(a.field_name = 'firstname', a.value, '')), ' ', max(if(a.field_name = 'lastname', a.value, '')), '"'),
		CONCAT('<' , max(if(a.field_name = 'email', a.value, '')), '>' ) 
	) as value  
FROM [data-table:798] a  
WHERE a.project_id=798
GROUP BY a.record 
ORDER BY value

Field Label:
Please identify up to FOUR (4) co-authors for your region who will serve as contributors and regional representatives on the following project.

[concept_id]: [concept_title]

Contact: [contact_link]

List them in the order in which they are to appear on the byline/masthead or in a collaborator list. In the case of abstracts or papers where authorship is limited, Concept Leads will include regional co-authors in the byline/masthead in the priority order provided by the region up to the allowable number.
